      • evaluate

        public void evaluate()
        Method called by calcul success probability Recursively take each child of current node and callback the method for each child. If evalPossilibity is true it calcul for this node the success probability

      • evalPossibility

        public boolean evalPossibility()
        Evaluate the possibility that the node can be calculable or not method evaluate if the node is a leaf or if the success probability of the current one is zero and the childs are not zero
        Returns:
        node is possible to evalute is true

      • calculSuccessProbADT

        public void calculSuccessProbADT()

        public void evaluateADT()

      • evalPossibilityADT

        public boolean evalPossibilityADT()
        Evalute the possibility that an attack node in a attack defence tree can be calculable or not. If an attackNode has a child who has a type called Counter calcul can be possible
        Returns:
        containMeasure if the node contain measure is true
